title: Standard Queen Room
description: A cozy 25sqm room with a comfortable queen-sized bed. Perfect for solo travelers or couples.

title: Deluxe Queen Room
description: A spacious 40sqm room with a queen-sized bed, perfect for couples. Enjoy stunning city views.

title: Standard King Room
description: A well-appointed 30sqm room featuring a plush king-sized bed and modern amenities.

title: Deluxe King with Balcony
description: Enjoy the extra space and a private balcony in this 45sqm room with a king-sized bed.

title: Executive King Suite
description: Experience luxury in our 70sqm suite, featuring a separate living area and executive lounge access.

title: Family Room with Two Double Beds
description: Ideal for families, this 55sqm room offers two double beds and a comfortable seating area.

title: Corner King with Panoramic View
description: This 50sqm room offers stunning panoramic city views from its corner location.

title: Superior Twin Room
description: Perfect for friends or colleagues, this room features two comfortable single beds.

title: Junior Suite
description: A stylish 60sqm open-plan suite with a king bed and a spacious seating area.

title: Accessible Queen Room
description: This room is designed for guests with additional accessibility needs, featuring wider doorways and a roll-in shower.

title: The Penthouse Suite
description: The pinnacle of luxury. A 150sqm suite with a private terrace, dining area, and personalized butler service.

title: Studio King
description: A modern 35sqm studio layout with a king bed and a convenient kitchenette.

title: City View Queen
description: A comfortable room on a high floor offering spectacular views of the city skyline.

title: Garden View Twin
description: A peaceful room overlooking our serene internal gardens, with two single beds.

title: Two-Story Loft Suite
description: A unique two-level suite with a bedroom on the mezzanine and a living area below.

title: Wellness Suite
description: Focus on your well-being in this suite, equipped with a yoga mat, air purifier, and spa-like bathroom.

title: Connecting Room (King)
description: Part of a connecting pair, this room has a king bed and can be booked with its twin counterpart.

title: Connecting Room (Twin)
description: Part of a connecting pair, this room has two single beds and is ideal for family groups.

title: Grand Presidential Suite
description: Our most opulent accommodation, offering unparalleled luxury, space, and service.

title: Economy Single
description: A compact and affordable room for the budget-conscious solo traveler.

title: King Room with Terrace
description: A beautiful room featuring a large outdoor terrace for relaxing and dining.
